title: Mortimer Mcmire
content:
can somebody show me 1 sprite of Mortimer Mcmire so that i can edit the keen sprites & make them look like mort?

btw: i will probally make a zip of mort sprites if i get 1 sprite of mort[url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]

WIPE OUT BUSH! WIPE OUT HOWARD!

title: Mort sprite
content:
Mort has never existed as a sprite, except in one place. The Mangling Machine of Keen 3 had a sprite that looked like [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortvort.gif[/img] , except you could also see his hands. No full body sprite of Mortimer McMire has ever existed in the official Keens.

Wait... that's not true. There was a full Mortimer sprite in the Keen game for Gameboy Color. You could get that one.

title: Re: Mort sprite
content:
GBC was junk, Mr. 1212 (check your post count.)
And that mortimer wasn't a sprite. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]
You could use mine or Xky's (both VERY similar)
Then of course theres this: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]

But if you want to make your own, follow these rules:

1. Black or Dark gray helmet.
2. Red M's or white circles (you can also have a red stripe where keen's white and green stripes are) on the helmet
3. black, dark gray, or dark blue shirt/pants.
4. red belt
5. evil look on face
6. taller and/or tougher looking than Keen (remember he bullies him)[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: lol
content:
I always imagined Mortimer wearing dress type clothing. In Keen 3 all we see is his upper body and it looks like he is wearing a dress shirt, suspenders and a black helmet with 2 Ms on the side (what team is THAT one from?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] ).

This is my idea of what Mort looks like:
[img]http://img141.echo.cx/img141/4859/mortcopy0yd.png[/img]
(It is a quick sketch)

Although you COULD go with how he looks in Keen GBC. Pretty much Keen with black clothes, black helmet with red stripe down the middle(no MMs on the side) and... um, sun...glasses...

To see a better pic of Mort's helmet, check out Spatang [url=http://dosclassics.com/keen/of.php?a=5]here[/url]. Click on ending sequence and keep clicking the green over arrow.-----------------------

title: Re: lol
content:
I haven't played the GBC game, but I'd have to agree with you when you say the enemies look terrible.
Recognition is a major part in getting old fans to like your sequel, and... well, no need to explain.

Interesting sig, but if you equip your pogo, jump on a Bounder when he's at his highest point, and do a Pogo-enhanced jump, you'll get quite high.
Not exactly often useful, but it takes a little skill, and it's fun to fool around with Bounders. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten.

title: Re: hehe
content: Hey! There's a BRILLIANT idea I just thought about! If you ride on Bounders on spikes you don't get killed, right? When modding, It's a cool thing turning spikes or that black puddle (or if there's water at Keen 4 and I just don't remember) into water, and turning the Bounders into hopping sea turtles or something, and It'll help you cross lakes! Isn't that a briliant idea? (Or maybe someone has already thought about it...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] )Couldn't he just use the pogo!?

title: Re: hehe
content: I don't think Bounders can hop over water or tar. I'll experiment once I've got TED5 working on DOSBox again.

title: Re: hehe
content: They can hop on anything solid, so as long as theres solid blocks under it...[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]
